channel.title: MarketWatch.com - Top Stories
channel.description: MarketWatch, a leading publisher of business and financial news, offers users up-to-the minute news, investment tools, and subscription products.
channel.copyright: Copyright © Dow Jones & Company, Inc. All rights reserved.

item.title: Verizon’s problems ‘aren’t just narrative’ — but here’s the bull case for the stock
item.description: Wolfe Research analyst Peter Supino upgraded the stock to outperform from peer perform late Wednesday, writing that he and his team "really like" the risk-reward balance.
item.author: Emily Bary

item.title: Sharing COVID therapy secrets is a Trojan horse that would gut U.S. biotech
item.description: IP waiver would allow developing countries access to formulas and manufacturing details.
item.author: James Pooley

item.title: Seize Russia’s frozen assets to support Ukraine’s military and finance its recovery
item.description: Russia must be held accountable for the devastation it has wrought.
item.author: Joseph E. Stiglitz
Andrew Kosenko

item.title: ‘I discovered a lot of shady business practices’: I want to blow the whistle on my former employer, but I signed an NDA. Am I doomed?
item.description: "The company I left is OK with getting paid monthly for services even if they never had the capability or intention of following through with those services."
item.author: Quentin Fottrell

item.title: ‘How’s that for bouncing back?’ How to get through financial disasters.
item.description: Author Lynnette Khalfani-Cox revisits an old office years after a layoff to talk about her new book about bouncing back.
item.author: Beth Pinsker

item.title: Microsoft gets closer to overtaking Apple as most valuable U.S. company
item.description: Now valued at $2.73 trillion, Microsoft is worth about $100 billion less than Apple, which is valued at $2.83 trillion.
item.author: Emily Bary

item.title: A payment method that some call ‘phantom debt’ just hit a new record
item.description: Wells Fargo economists say “there is no way to know when this phantom debt could create substantial problems."
item.author: Andrew Keshner
Emily Bary

item.title: Nasdaq logs longest losing streak in over a year, S&P 500 falls for a fourth day to extend the dismal 2024 start
item.description: U.S. stocks finished mostly lower on Thursday, with the technology-heavy Nasdaq Composite booking its fifth straight session of losses, as a fresh batch of labor-market data sparked renewed concerns about the Federal Reserve's monetary-tightening path in 2024.
item.author: Isabel Wang
Joseph Adinolfi

item.title: The hottest real-estate market of 2024 will be this snowy Northeastern city, Zillow says
item.description: "Although our temperatures are cold, our market is not," one local real-estate broker says.
item.author: Aarthi Swaminathan

item.title: Why Red Sea chaos is driving oil buyers ‘into the arms of U.S. shale producers’
item.description: U.S. crude exports could be on track to break record as a result of attacks on shipping in the Red Sea, says veteran oil analyst.
item.author: Myra P. Saefong
